body:
MAIB Report on the investigation of the foundering of the fv Achieve and the death of a crew member north-west of the Island of Taransay, Western Isles on 21 February 2013. Report No 3/2014. Published 10 January 2014.

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (3,769.70 kb) 

A Safety Flyer was also produced for this incident and can be viewed on our website:  
[Read Safety Flyer](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/accident_flyers/accident_flyers_2014/achieve_flyer.cfm)
